data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring chronology of Picea abies (Norway spruce) compiled from tree samples BALF
Exposition NW, Slope 10 deg, Geology: Kalkschutt, av. Tree height 20 m, Tree cover 65%, Shrub cover 10%, Herb cover 5%, Vegatation type: Hom. windgesch. tiefgr. Fi-Standort. Feucht, Film number: 667A
